welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shady Hills, a charming small town known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Zephyrhills Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Zephyrhills Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A at Tampa International Airport serves primarily domestic flights for airlines such as Delta, United, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C at Tampa International Airport serves primarily international flights for airlines such as Lufthansa, British Airways, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E at Tampa International Airport serves primarily domestic flights for airlines such as Southwest, American, and Alaska.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
